<module name="TreeWalker">
        <module name="JavadocVariable">
            <property name="accessModifiers" value="public, protected"/>
        </module>
        <module name="MissingJavadocMethod">
            <property name="scope" value="protected"/>
            <property name="allowMissingPropertyJavadoc" value="true"/>
            <property name="allowedAnnotations" value="Override, Test"/>
            <property name="tokens" value="METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF,
                                       COMPACT_CTOR_DEF"/>
        </module>
        <module name="MissingJavadocType">
            <property name="scope" value="protected"/>
            <property name="tokens"
                    value="CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF,
                          RECORD_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF"/>
            <property name="excludeScope" value="nothing"/>
        </module>
        <module name="InvalidJavadocPosition"/>
        <module name="SuppressionXpathSingleFilter">
            <property name="checks" value="JavadocVariable, MissingJavadocMethod, MissingJavadocType"/>
            <property name="query" value="//*[self::VARIABLE_DEF or self::METHOD_DEF or self::CTOR_DEF or self::CLASS_DEF or self::INTERFACE_DEF or self::ENUM_DEF or self::RECORD_DEF or self::ANNOTATION_DEF]
            [ancestor::*[self::METHOD_DEF or self::CLASS_DEF or self::INTERFACE_DEF or self::ENUM_DEF or self::RECORD_DEF or self::ANNOTATION_DEF]
             [not(./MODIFIERS/LITERAL_PUBLIC or ./MODIFIERS/LITERAL_PROTECTED)]
            or not(ancestor::*[not(ancestor::*)][./MODIFIERS/LITERAL_PUBLIC])]"/>
        </module>
    </module>
